{"id":888493991,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1675135402,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"184 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/888493991/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Monotonic Array","memory":"96.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isMonotonic(vector<int>& A) {\n        bool inc = false;\n        bool dec = false;\n\n        for (int i = 1; i < A.size(); i++) {\n            if (A[i] < A[i - 1]) {\n                dec = true;\n            }\n            if (A[i] > A[i - 1]) {\n                inc = true;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return inc && dec ? false : true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"monotonic-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
